Body:
Nx, Ny, Nz = 10, 10, 1
Lc = 0.0001
pn = op.network.Cubic(shape=[Nx, Ny, Nz], spacing=Lc)
pn2 = op.network.Cubic(shape=[Nx, Ny, Nz], spacing=Lc)
pn2['pore.coords'] += [Lc * Nx, 0, 0]
op.topotools.stitch(network=pn, donor=pn2, P_network=pn.pores('back'),
    P_donor=pn2.pores('front'), method='radius', len_max=0, label_stitches=
    ['test', 'test2'])
assert pn.Nt == pn2.Nt * 2
